library(tidyverse)
library(stargazer)
library(gt)
library(dplyr)
educ <- read.csv("sect2_education.csv", na.strings = " ")
health<-read.csv("sect3_health.csv", na.strings = " ")
income<-read.csv("sect13_income.csv", na.strings = " ")
remittances<-read.csv("sect5_remittances.csv", na.strings = " ")
food<-read.csv("sect6c_aggregate_food_1.csv", na.strings = " ")




Merging datasets


#filtering required columns from all datasets
neduc <- data.frame(educ$hhid,educ$s02q08)
nhealth<-data.frame(health$hhid,health$s03q24)
nincome<-data.frame(income$hhid,income$s13q02)
nremittances<-data.frame(remittances$hhid,remittances$s05q02a)
nfood<-data.frame(food$hhid,food$s06cq08)

neduc <- neduc %>% rename(hhid = educ.hhid)
nhealth <- nhealth %>% rename(hhid = health.hhid)
nincome <- nincome %>% rename(hhid = income.hhid)
nremittances <- nremittances %>% rename(hhid = remittances.hhid)
nfood <- nfood %>% rename(hhid = food.hhid)

#merging all data sets
merged_data <- inner_join(neduc, nhealth, by = 'hhid')%>% 
               inner_join(nincome, by = 'hhid') %>% 
               inner_join(nremittances, by = 'hhid') %>% 
               inner_join(nfood, by = 'hhid')
